'''1.20.4 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.20.4-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.4]], released on December 6, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-4-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.20.4 Release Candidate 1|December 6, 2023}}</ref> which fixes a critical bug. This is the final release candidate released in 2023.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.4 Release Candidate 1
|;From 1.20.3
|267185|Decorated pots can delete items when reloading the world.
